WorkItem.Description:
For both the online and downloadable public beta, it consistently crashes whilst attempt to load all mage characters from nagrand, 90% of the time it shows stuck on parsing, 10 % just crashes outright
 
steps to reproduce (for me anyway) - 
load application
attempt to load mysticfire @nagrand eu (tried numerous other mages on this server as well, selune, ghosthani, maub, khrom, elesemera...
>crash<
 
Rawr beta3 - v1.0
OSX 10.6.3
 
no char file is ever loaded in nor a log of crash
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] Crash on loading Mages from EU Armory

Comments.Message: I don't have any problems loading those characters. Can you be more specific about what kind of crash this is?
The program becomes non responsive, the progress bar spinning staying at Parsing Char , Loading from armory. After a while (10 mins) osx terminates the program itself, if not i have to force quite .
Have you tried opening that character from elitist armory (http://elitistarmory.com/)?
i can open all characters on elitistarmory but rawr still crashes when i try and upload those characters
Is this issue still present in the current Rawr3 version?
